Text: QF Writeup Development Spreadsheetis the doc for the QF writeup and the development spreadsheet created by FPL combined with our assets I have taken out the implied EBITDA section for now whcih we can add it back in if we want to

LV Cogen Pastoria Cc please send us your latest operating model for Pastoria and LV Cogen We are in the process of updating a spreadsheet to value the development projects For now we are concerned primarily with Net Income Aftertax Cashflow Capitalization Capex and Debt Assumptions Also since Winston is leaving for Bschool soon who should Ben and Jinsung contact for future modeling questionsconcerning Pastoria Thanks

GenCo Breakeven AnalysisMeant to forward to you but forwarded instead to Thomason Forwarded by Clement LauHOUECT on PM Clement Lau PM To Adam nron Thomas M NRON Kate CT cc Don CT Jinsung nron Benjamin CT Subject GenCo Breakeven Analysis Attached is the GenCo Breakeven Analysis Please call me if you have any questions Clement x

WeeklyMonthly Reports Cc Teresa Amy I am leaving Enron at the end of next week When you distribute your respective weeklymonthly reports OM Capex PL could you please forward them to Jinsung Myung and Ben Rogers so that they can generate the weekly report that I have been generating while I am gone For the time being please continue forwarding the reports to me Thanks
Weely Model for the Week of is the Weekly Model together with linked files for USD Libor OM Capex and revenues from Jenny

Info Memo Pictures Maps Cc saved the first info memo generic version wo mentioned of Orion under EGCGeneric and various site pictures and maps under Pictures folder both in odropbox I will continue transfering file to the odropbox over the next few days
Timetable and Contact List Cc the electronic copy of the abovementioned I have given you
Templateme know your comments I think we should send it to FPL soonest possible by today

Low Case Dispatch Analysis and Market PricesForwarded by Clement LauHOUECT on PM Don Miller PM To Clement CT cc Subject Low Case Dispatch Analysis and Market Prices Forwarded by Don MillerHOUECT on PM Mukherjee Gautam VA on PM To Don Miller Email cc Fusco Maria VA Goldman Lenka VA Leitz Thomas VA Subject Low Case Dispatch Analysis and Market Prices Hi Don Enclosed please find copies of the Low Case market results Let me know if you have any questions Email Formatxls Nominal Email Formatxls Email Format All Hour Pricesxls Thanks Gautam Mukherjee Senior Associate ICF Consulting Voice Fax Email Formatxls Nominal Email Formatxls Email Format All Hour Pricesxls

Weekly GenCo Model Cc the weekly GenCo model You might want to start getting familiar with it before things get heated up for FPL We can sit down early next week so that I can walk thru with you how the model works and how to update it weekly Thanks
Project E Contact List Cc the updated Project E Contact List Please let me know of any changes needed
Project E Contact List Draftis a draft copy of the Project E Contact List Please verify your contact information and email me any changes needed Thanks
GenCo Model Cc the final version of the GenCo model sent out to Orion in the Information Memorandum yesterday Have a great weekend

Re FINANCIAL RESTRUCTURINGForwarded by Clement LauHOUECT on PM From Mitch Robinson ENRON PM To Clement NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Chaundra PerryENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Tom CallaghanENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Don NRONDEVELOPMENT Subject Re FINANCIAL RESTRUCTURING To all Ill have to call in Clement once youre set up in AC please call my assistant Felecia at or me at and Ill patch in Mitch Clement CT PM To Chaundra PerryENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Mitch NRONDEVELOPMENT Tom CallaghanENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Don CT Subject Re FINANCIAL RESTRUCTURING I will be able to meet if it fits everyones schedule I will be in the office till late tonight Chaundra NRONDEVELOPMENT PM To Mitch nron Clement CT Tom CallaghanENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Don CT cc Subject FINANCIAL RESTRUCTURING Mitch Tom will be in the office tomorrow He can meet at am The meeting location is AC Thanks Chaundra Forwarded by Chaundra PerryENRONDEVELOPMENT on PM Chaundra Perry PM To Mitch nron Clement CT Tom CallaghanENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject FINANCIAL RESTRUCTURING Mitch Per your request I am having copies of the budget for the and Peakers delivered to you and Clement You should receive them within the hour I contacted Tom and informed him you are requesting a meeting to discuss the current estimate for each site He indicated he would be available for a conference call tomorrow morning He was in the process of catching his flight and stated he would contact me in the morning Thanks Chaundra
Genco Modeland I would still be making changes For now this is my most current model
MapsForwarded by Clement LauHOUECT on PM From Keith Fraley PM To Clement CT cc Subject Maps
Genco Modelis the GenCo model
Reliant StockPortfoliofor the graphs Forwarded by Clement LauHOUECT on AM Richard NRON PM To Don CT cc Benjamin CT Clement CT Subject Reliant StockPortfolio Latest versions
Reliantis what we did for Reliant If you need a map you can just delete Reliants assets and add Cinergys Thanks
Presentationyou have time please help provide feedback on the presentation Thanks

Re Heat rate and Capacity tableto see if you want to go to the meeting Forwarded by Clement LauHOUECT on PM Bruce NRONDEVELOPMENT PM To Clement CT cc Subject Re Heat rate and Capacity table AM it is we will meet in Mike Colemans office on AC Thanx Bruce Clement CT PM To Bruce GoldenENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject Re Heat rate and Capacity table It am OK for you I will go over to your office for the meeting and maybe get Doug and Ben to join us Bruce NRONDEVELOPMENT PM To Clement CT cc Subject Re Heat rate and Capacity table His data was LHV roughly multiply by to get HHV For some reason several of the ENA proposals used LHV so I though that LHV maybe usual for ENA deals If you are modeling a long term Enron owned deal then we should model degradation on heat rate Santee Cooper ReBox If it is a EPC directly to a host ElectriCities Springfield City of Austin the sale would be new clean but we would model our three year power transaction with just the initial heat rate degradation You and I ought to look at the degradation curve that most closely matches and eyeball the year and average degradation How bout in the morning you pick the time I have an AM tech meeting Thanx Bruce Clement CT PM To Bruce GoldenENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject Heat rate and Capacity table Bernsteins model has a table that provide the heat rate and capacity based on ISO degrees chillerno chiller gas compression etc I am not sure whether I should go with these numbers but I know the heat rate is off because I heard that the heat rate is HHV instead of HHV unless Bernsteins model is in HHV which I was told was not I got your message about not modeling capacity degradation Should we still model heat rate degradation Please tell me when you would be available to discuss further Thanks
Comparisoncatch I amde a mistake

LM Models Cc of you who might be working on LM transactions there is a rough cut of a standardized Financial Model and a old Capital Cost Configuration Model that you can use for currentfuture LM projects Both of them are saved as readonly at onaesfromkoLMcontrol If you do not have access please compose a Security Request via Lotus Notes Please note that there are still work to be done on both models If you are assigned with any LM models please keep me in the loop and I can fill you in on the model progress and process Thanks Clement Lau x

Standard Modelhave saved the file with a password model to restrict access Forwarded by Clement LauHOUECT on PM Clement Lau PM To Benjamin CT Mathew CT James CT Jason R CT cc Erin CT Marilyn N CT Elizabeth CT Webb CT Subject Standard Model Ben Matthew Jim Jason As per discussion I have created a common folder onaesfromkoLMsControl for storage of the cost configuation model and finanicial base model Since Ben has to model Lincoln by next week I suggest we use his model as the go forward base model from now onwards By modeling an actual transaction it would be easier for us to identify needed changes and links If you guys have time please look thru the model and list the changes needed We could then have a meeting next week to go through the suggestions and discuss how to coordinate taking turns working on the model Ben I will continue making cosmetic changes to the model for now but I would make sure that the changes do not mess up the economics of the transaction Everyone If any of you need to model anything please use this base model If you do not have access to the directory please create a security request form through lotus notes Thanks

Marks Modeldouble check the Capacity number when you use Mark Bernsteins model Matthew Gimble and I found out that when you click ISO the model actually spits out degrees MW and vice versa Please call me if you have questions

Re Heat rate and Capacity tableto see if you want to go to the meeting Forwarded by Clement LauHOUECT on PM Bruce NRONDEVELOPMENT PM To Clement CT cc Subject Re Heat rate and Capacity table AM it is we will meet in Mike Colemans office on AC Thanx Bruce Clement CT PM To Bruce GoldenENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject Re Heat rate and Capacity table It am OK for you I will go over to your office for the meeting and maybe get Doug and Ben to join us Bruce NRONDEVELOPMENT PM To Clement CT cc Subject Re Heat rate and Capacity table His data was LHV roughly multiply by to get HHV For some reason several of the ENA proposals used LHV so I though that LHV maybe usual for ENA deals If you are modeling a long term Enron owned deal then we should model degradation on heat rate Santee Cooper ReBox If it is a EPC directly to a host ElectriCities Springfield City of Austin the sale would be new clean but we would model our three year power transaction with just the initial heat rate degradation You and I ought to look at the degradation curve that most closely matches and eyeball the year and average degradation How bout in the morning you pick the time I have an AM tech meeting Thanx Bruce Clement CT PM To Bruce GoldenENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject Heat rate and Capacity table Bernsteins model has a table that provide the heat rate and capacity based on ISO degrees chillerno chiller gas compression etc I am not sure whether I should go with these numbers but I know the heat rate is off because I heard that the heat rate is HHV instead of HHV unless Bernsteins model is in HHV which I was told was not I got your message about not modeling capacity degradation Should we still model heat rate degradation Please tell me when you would be available to discuss further Thanks

Standard Model Cc Matthew Jim Jason As per discussion I have created a common folder onaesfromkoLMsControl for storage of the cost configuation model and finanicial base model Since Ben has to model Lincoln by next week I suggest we use his model as the go forward base model from now onwards By modeling an actual transaction it would be easier for us to identify needed changes and links If you guys have time please look thru the model and list the changes needed We could then have a meeting next week to go through the suggestions and discuss how to coordinate taking turns working on the model Ben I will continue making cosmetic changes to the model for now but I would make sure that the changes do not mess up the economics of the transaction Everyone If any of you need to model anything please use this base model If you do not have access to the directory please create a security request form through lotus notes Thanks
